job_history.work_description: Teaches students how to locate media in the library, and empowers students to be responsible for their individual library needs. Checks library accounts for staff, parents, and students. Organizes books, keeps a clean workspace and process daily shelving needs of the library. Assist in individual needs for the entire school.

Improved many areas of the business, including saving money by creating an in-house system using Excel, negotiating a better price for internet and phone services, setting up new wholesale accounts for equipment and uniform needs, and planning the relocation of the dojo. Also handled every aspect of moving from one location to a new location, revised the way of communication to students and parents, and increased customer satisfaction.

Created a warm and welcoming environment for children, staff and parents. Helped maintained the employees and volunteer's schedule. Lead worship time, small group discussions, and all children's activities.
Increased sales productivity, as well as, guest service by utilizing different methods of communications. Established an organized system for daily needs of answering emails, fax and phone calls.

Managed the electronics department that handled exchanges, returns, purchases, customer service, and complaints, building displays, inventory and managing back stock. Managed a team of employees during peak and off-peak seasons that included training.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including managing teams, training employees, and handling customer service and complaints, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in creating an organized system for daily needs of answering emails, fax and phone calls, and has utilized different methods of communications to increase sales productivity and guest service, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience in improving business areas, including saving money by creating an in-house system using Excel, and has handled every aspect of moving from one location to a new location, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in maintaining a clean workspace, processing daily shelving needs of the library, and has handled multiple tasks simultaneously, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in handling customer service and complaints, and has increased customer satisfaction, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Has used Excel to create an in-house system, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience in planning the relocation of the dojo, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching students how to locate media in the library, and has led worship time, small group discussions, and all children's activities, indicating some practical experience.
